mapper.select: SELECT b.usernick,a.taskpk,a.taskid,a.taskkeynum,a.tasktype,a.taskkeyword,a.flowcount AS flowcounts,a.collectioncount AS collectioncounts,a.shoppingcount AS shoppingcounts,a.taskdate,a.createtime as publishtime,a.taskstate,a.createuser,a.createtime FROM t_task_info a LEFT JOIN t_user_info b ON a.createuser=b.userid WHERE a.taskdate >= #{taskdate} AND a.taskpk NOT IN (SELECT taskpk FROM t_task_info_query) AND a.taskstate!='15'
mapper.insert: insert into t_task_info_query (usernick, taskpk,taskid, taskkeynum, tasktype, taskkeyword, flowcounts, collectioncounts, shoppingcounts, finshflowcounts, finshcollectioncounts, finshshoppingcounts, errorcounts, taskdate, publishtime, taskstate, createtime, createuser, updatetime, updateuser ) values (#{usernick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskpk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskkeynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tasktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskkeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowcounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectioncounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shoppingcounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finshflowcounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finshcollectioncounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finshshoppingcounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{errorcounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_task_info_query set finshflowcounts = #{finshflowcounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finshcollectioncounts = #{finshcollectioncounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finshshoppingcounts = #{finshshoppingcounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, errorcounts = #{errorcounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateuser = #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where taskid = #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
